properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 050159Z JAN 13
   BY M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V NPS OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING THREE 200 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-21.30S 040-03.03W, 22-26.43S 039-54.93W,
   22-28.32S 039-56.02W, 22-23.38S 040-04.28W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 050259Z JAN 13.
